text:
After highscool I wanted to follow studies about a subject that I felt passionnate about.
I get to a biology university so studie sciences, becose I loved (and still love to this day) nature and biology.
After two years I felt like I have lost focus. The objective I gave myself became a little blurry, and working in the researche department felt more and more like a utopy, an unoptanable dream that could never come true.
So I thought about a different field of studie I could work on, and came with the idea of being a teacher.
I have always been passionnate about education, the action of learning, and transmitting your knowledge with others.
I felt like I would love to work with kids, see them grow and becoming adults with my help. I want to give as many people as I can the keys to succes in life, and the basic meaning of what it means to live an happy life.
This is maybe a bit vague and unrealistic, but in my childhood I have been helped and supported by many adults who gave me wisdom, knowledge and the will to continue, to be myself and to learn how to be happy in my life.
I think teaching the kids good moral values is the most important point to create a better futur, for them to succed in their lifes and help humanity to progress.
In conclusion I would say that the main point that inspired me was the great teachers I had in primary school and highschool. Patients and brave adults with a lot of compassion, who give me confidence, time to express myself, and show me how I could give value to my work and my life. And now my dream would be to help others like the helped me, to do my part for a better future.
Also I read/watch some books/TV shows/moovies about education that gave me great lessons on what it means to teach others, and I can't denie that was also a part of what inspired me.
It was only 20 minutes, but I think I told what I wanted to. I could take more time to express myself, and use some personnal examples, but I do not feel like it right now.
Have a good day.
